word: At the close of my discourse, I felt impressed by the Spirit of God to extend an invitation for all those to come forward who desired to give themselves fully to the Lord.  . . . About thirty came forward. Among these were the wives of the brethren A [TWO BROTHERS WHO WERE CHURCH MEMBERS, BUT WHOSE WIVES WERE NOT.] who for the first time made manifest their desire to come near to God. My heart was filled with unspeakable gratitude because of the movement made by these two women.
